content: Karl Lagerfeld was an original, and was recognizable chiefly because of his white hair, black eyeglasses, starched collars and black, fingerless gloves.
translations: ita:Karl Lagerfeld era originale, ed era riconoscibile soprattutto per via dei suoi capelli bianchi, occhiali da vista neri,
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Objectivesea (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
